verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

By <S%H422>swearing,<s%> and <S%H3584>lying,<s%> and <S%H7523>killing,<s%> and <S%H1589>stealing,<s%> and <S%H5003>committing<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> they <S%H6555>break<s%> out, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> therein shall <S%H535>languish,<s%> with the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and with the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be <S%H622>taken<s%> away.

<S%H389>Yet<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7378>strive,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H376>another:<s%> for your <S%H5971>people<s%> are as they that <S%H7378>strive<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

Therefore shall you <S%H3782>fall<s%> in the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> with you in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> your <S%H517>mother.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> I will also <S%H3988>reject<s%> you, that you shall be no <S%H3547>priest<s%> to me: seeing you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H430>God,<s%> I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
As they were <S%H7230>increased,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me: therefore will I <S%H4171>change<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
They <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H5375>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
And there shall be, like <S%H5971>people,<s%> like <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7725>reward<s%> them their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

For they shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and not have <S%H7646>enough:<s%> they shall <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> and shall not <S%H6555>increase:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H5800>left<s%> off to take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> counsel at their <S%H6086>stocks,<s%> and their <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5046>declares<s%> to them: for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>prostitutions<s%> has caused them to <S%H8582>err,<s%> and they have gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H437>oaks<s%> and <S%H3839>poplars<s%> and <S%H424>elms,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> thereof is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> and your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> shall <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>

I will not <S%H6485>punish<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> nor your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery:<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves<s%> are <S%H6504>separated<s%> with <S%H2181>whores,<s%> and they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H6948>harlots:<s%> therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> that does not <S%H995>understand<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> you, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> play the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> yet let not <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H816>offend;<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> not you to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> you up to <S%H1007>Bethaven,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5637>slides<s%> <S%H5637>back<s%> as a <S%H5637>backsliding<s%> <S%H6510>heifer:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them as a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a <S%H4800>large<s%> place.

Their <S%H5435>drink<s%> is <S%H5493>sour:<s%> they have <S%H2181>committed<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution<s%> continually: her <S%H4043>rulers<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%> do <S%H157>love,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> you.
The <S%H7307>wind<s%> has <S%H6887>bound<s%> her up in her <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> because of their <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%>
